Posts.Content: On Apr 25, 2010 4:30 PM joeys_mom wrote: Same here ...I thought they were poisenous too. but I guess when you use them in a certain way they suppose to help to cure cancer ? it has laitriene.??   Please have  a look at his website (it was designed by one of the woman who used apricot kernels and other natural protocols and is now cancer free) : www.anticancerinfo.co.uk for research and important info... Also, a book by Professor Jane plant "The Plant Program" is extremely informative as far as breast and testicular cancer is concerned.
